job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: strongAt strong strongAnyscalestrong strong were looking for passionate motivated people who are excited to build tools that will power the next generation of cloud applications If the idea of an infinite laptop appeals to you lets build the future of software development togetherbrbrstrongWere hiring exceptional software engineers for a variety of open roles includingbrbrulli Distributed systemslili Machine learninglili Frontendlili Observabilitylili Production servinglili Ecosystemlili Clili Reinforcement learningbrbrliulstrongAs Part Of Your Role You WillbrbrstrongulliDevelop highquality software to empower software developers and simplify programmingliliWork with a team of leading experts in distributed systems and machine learningliliCommunicate your work to a broader audience through talks tutorials and blog postsliliHelp us build and shape a worldclass companybrbrliulOnce its safe to do so you must be willing to work onsite in our San Francisco officebrbrstrongAbout AnyscalebrbrstrongAnyscale provides a platform for developers to build distributed applications Were commercializing a popular open source project called Ray  which is a framework for distributed computing as well as an ecosystem of libraries for scalable machine learning Building on its success 14k stars on GitHub and contributors from over 100 companies our goal is to create a standardized platform for distributed computingbrbrRay was developed at UC Berkeley by Robert Nishihara and Philipp Moritz under the guidance of Ion Stoica and Michael Jordan  and the four of them have cofounded Anyscale As a company weve raised a 206M Series A and a 40M Series B from Andreessen Horowitz a16z and NEA With industry leaders like Ben Horowitz on our Board were thrilled to be building the distributed computing platform of the future and we want you to join usbrbrWith Ray  were making it easy to program at any scale from your laptop to the datacenter by providing easytouse generalpurpose and highperformance tools In addition were building a rich ecosystem of libraries for reinforcement learning hyperparameter search experiment management machine learning training prediction serving and more on top of the core distributed system so that users can rapidly build sophisticated applicationsbrbrstrongHere at Anyscale we value diverse perspectives and backgrounds and challenging the status quo is an integral part of our culture Even if you dont meet the above specifications exactly we encourage you to apply brbrstrongstrongBuilding a diverse team isnt easy so lets do it together  apply todaystrong
